apiDescription: Our API uses a REST based design, leverages the JSON data format, and relies upon HTTPS for transport. We respond with meaningful HTTP response codes and if an error occurs, we include error details in the response body.  API Documentation is at https://api.ynab.com
metaDescription: Working hard with nothing to show for it? Use your money more efficiently and control your spending and saving with the YNAB app.

parameters.name: includeAccounts
parameters.description: Whether to include the list of budget accounts

parameters.name: budgetId
parameters.description: The id of the budget. "last-used" can be used to specify the last used budget and "default" can be used if default budget selection is enabled (see: https://api.ynab.com/#oauth-default-budget).

parameters.name: lastKnowledgeOfServer
parameters.description: The starting server knowledge.  If provided, only entities that have changed since `last_knowledge_of_server` will be included.

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: If specified, only transactions on or after this date will be included.  The date should be ISO formatted (e.g. 2016-12-30).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: If specified, only transactions of the specified type will be included. "uncategorized" and "unapproved" are currently supported.

repositoryDescription: Working hard with nothing to show for it? Use your money more efficiently and control your spending and saving with the YNAB app. You Need A Budget's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
